LiquidRichText.Text: 1. Washington D.C, which is located on Granada River, became the capital of Brazil in 1990.
2. Brasilia, which is located on Granada River, became the capital of Brazil in 1960.
3. Mexico City, which has a population of nearly 20000000, is the largest metropolitan area in the world.
4. Seoul, which hosted the 1988 Summer Olympics, is well-known for its shopping centres.
5. Kyoto, which used to be the capital of Japan, has many temples.
